pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 13, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, September 13, 2017:

St. Johnâ€™s, Newfoundland and Labrador

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Sheraton Hotel Newfoundland
115 Cavendish Square

Notes for media:

  • On-site coverage of the Cabinet Retreat open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk on site.
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the family photo and will hold a media availability.

Quidi Vidi Village Plantation
10 Maple View Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Youth Council. A group hike to Signal Hill will follow.

Signal Hill Visitor Centre
230 Signal Hill Road

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

Note: All times local
